channel.title: Services | Build Hello Business | Great websites optimized for great search results. on
channel.description: Recent content in Services | Build Hello Business | Great websites optimized for great search results. on

item.title: Starter Package | Services | Build Hello Business | Many fine tasks quickly combined and mixed like pancake batter into one incredibly complete looking website, for just $899?
item.description: Getting started on your new business means having a brand, website, and business cards. Our quickstart starter package gets you set up with the bare minimum. It’s an easy way to get something smart up you can work on later.

item.title: Design | Services | Build Hello Business | Sketches. Scribbles on the back of napkins. Wireframes. Mockups. Prototypes.
item.description: Because somebody has to design your collateral. We can help you out with some sexy ideas, and even put together a prototype you can view and share with your team online.

item.title: Web Development | Services | Build Hello Business | Basically we build you a space ship, a space station, a space world...whatever you want.
item.description: It’s great to have your business in a place where customers can find you with a quick glance at their phone. Give us a call to help you out with, oh any websites you’ve ever dreamed up in your wildest dreams

item.title: Content Writing | Services | Build Hello Business | Carefully crafted words arranged in clever, campy and carefree, or confident and credible, crisp, non-cursive character strings (assuming you don't want cursive.)
item.description: Text, text, and more text. We write it. We edit it. We think it up and spill it out. Content writing for the web is a technical art-form. It’s a blend of research, style, and optimization. It’s something we do.

item.title: Refactoring | Services | Build Hello Business | That's 'refactoring of code,' which is to say restructuring your...how can we say this politely...'cryptography' into a modern top tier code base.
item.description: We won’t promise you an agency matrix…but we can refactor your code base!

item.title: Maintenance | Services | Build Hello Business | Tracking down that stray semi-colon. Pest Control. Very unpleasant virus removal. Updates!
item.description: When there’s a problem with your website, there’s a problem with everything else in your life. At Build Hello we put the energy you need into your website to bring you back to life
